Sentencas: In the development of solid oxide fuel cells it is necessary to be able to deposit metal and ceramic layers that are gas-tight or porous onto components of a variety of shapes and sizes (planar or tubular cells) respectively.
Titulo: THE POTENTIAL OF PLASMA SPRAYING FOR THE DEPOSITION OF COATINGS ON SOFC COMPONENTS

Sentencas: Process economics are important as efforts are being made to produce SOFC systems on a commercial basis.
Titulo: THE POTENTIAL OF PLASMA SPRAYING FOR THE DEPOSITION OF COATINGS ON SOFC COMPONENTS

Sentencas: Of the processes being investigated, plasma spraying in vacuum or in air offers several advantages.
Titulo: THE POTENTIAL OF PLASMA SPRAYING FOR THE DEPOSITION OF COATINGS ON SOFC COMPONENTS

Sentencas: For example, the use of powder as the material to form the layer, means that the powder chemistry and size distribution can be modified to vary the coating porosity and thus the gas permeability.
Titulo: THE POTENTIAL OF PLASMA SPRAYING FOR THE DEPOSITION OF COATINGS ON SOFC COMPONENTS

Sentencas: The coating density can be varied according to the selection of plasma parameters required to melt the powder.
Titulo: THE POTENTIAL OF PLASMA SPRAYING FOR THE DEPOSITION OF COATINGS ON SOFC COMPONENTS

Sentencas: Deposition flexibility is available by the plasma gun and component movement with regard to whether the substrate is a flat or a cylindrical surface Heating systems providing controlled temperatures are used during deposition thus reducing mechanical failures due to strain mismatch.
Titulo: THE POTENTIAL OF PLASMA SPRAYING FOR THE DEPOSITION OF COATINGS ON SOFC COMPONENTS
